summary.span: 完成此动态模块的全局函数定义和全局数据定义。

span.span: Completes the global function definitions and global data definitions for this dynamic module.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户完成定义此动态模块内的所有全局函数时，应调用此方法。This method should be called when the user is done with defining all the global functions within this dynamic module. 调用此函数后，不允许再有新的全局函数或新的全局数据。After calling this function, no more new global functions or new global data are allowed. > [!NOTE] > 从开始 [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)] ，此成员不再需要 带有 标志的。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (参阅 [反射发出中的安全问题](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit)。 ) 若要使用此功能，你的应用程序应面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用通过 `CreateGlobalFunctions` 实现的从中创建静态全局方法 。The following sample illustrates the use of `CreateGlobalFunctions` to create a static global method from a implemented with . remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义的枚举是的派生类 。The defined enum is a derived class of . `value__`字段具有 和 属性集。The `value__` field has and attributes set. 有关可以指定为基础枚举类型的内置整数类型的详细信息，请参阅 [类库概述](/dotnet/standard/class-library-overview)。For more information about the built-in integer types that can be specified as the underlying types of enumerations, see [Class Library Overview](/dotnet/standard/class-library-overview). > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 版本1.0 和1.1 中，需要使用定义枚举， 因为发出的 枚举的元素类型 而不是枚举类型。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, it is necessary to define enumerations using because emits enumerations whose elements are of type instead of the enumeration type. 在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 中， 发出其元素具有正确类型的枚举。In the .NET Framework version 2.0, emits enumerations whose elements have the correct type. > [!NOTE] > 从开始 [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)] ，此成员不再需要 带有 标志的。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (参阅 [反射发出中的安全问题](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit)。 ) 若要使用此功能，你的应用程序应面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `DefineEnum` 如何使用在动态模块中实现枚举类。The following example illustrates the use of `DefineEnum` to implement an enumeration class in a dynamic module. 该示例定义了一个名为的枚举， `Elevation` 该枚举的基础类型为 ，并创建了两个元素： `Low` ，其值为0，值为 `High` 1。The example defines an enumeration named `Elevation` that has an underlying type of , and creates two elements: `Low`, with a value of 0, and `High`, with a value of 1. 创建该类型后，将以该名称保存程序集 `TempAssembly.dll` 。After the type has been created, the assembly is saved with the name `TempAssembly.dll`. 您可以使用 [Ildasm.exe (IL 拆装器) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler) 来检查此程序集的内容。You can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler) to examine the contents of this assembly. > [!NOTE] > 在 .NET Framework 版本2.0 之前，此代码示例不生成正确的枚举。Prior to the .NET Framework version 2.0, this code example does not produce a correct enumeration. summary.span: 定义表示要在动态程序集中嵌入的清单资源的二进制大对象 (BLOB)。

span.span: Defines a binary large object (BLOB) that represents a manifest resource to be embedded in the dynamic assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 记录在程序集清单中的资源可以是托管资源或清单资源 Blob，其中的每个资源都可以通过链接或嵌入来包含在程序集中。Resources that are recorded in the assembly manifest can be managed resources or manifest resource BLOBs, and each of these can be included in the assembly either by linking or by embedding. 动态程序集支持所有四种方案。All four scenarios are supported for dynamic assemblies. - 此方法允许您将清单资源 BLOB 嵌入动态程序集。This method allows you to embed a manifest resource BLOB into a dynamic assembly. - 若要将托管资源嵌入动态程序集的清单模块或附属模块，请使用 方法获取资源编写器，并使用 方法添加资源。To embed a managed resource into the manifest module of a dynamic assembly or into a satellite module, use the method to get a resource writer, and use the method to add the resource. - 若要将托管资源链接到动态程序集，请使用 方法获取资源编写器，并使用 方法添加链接的资源。To link a managed resource into a dynamic assembly, use the method to get a resource writer, and use the method to add the linked resource. - 若要将清单资源 BLOB 链接到动态程序集，请使用 方法添加链接的资源。To link a manifest resource BLOB into a dynamic assembly, use the method to add the linked resource. 此外，通过使用方法或方法，可以将单个 Win32 资源附加到程序集 。In addition, a single Win32 resource can be attached to an assembly by using the method or the method. 此资源没有出现在程序集清单中。This resource does not appear in the assembly manifest. ## Examples 下面的示例生成并保存一个名为的动态程序集 `EmittedManifestResourceAssembly.exe` ，其中包含一个嵌入的非托管资源。The following example generates and saves a dynamic assembly named `EmittedManifestResourceAssembly.exe`, which contains an embedded unmanaged resource. 该示例创建程序集，该程序集包含一个模块，并打开一个内存流以包含非托管资源。The example creates the assembly, which consists of one module, and opens a memory stream to contain the unmanaged resource. 然后，该代码调用 方法来定义资源。The code then calls the method to define the resource. > [!NOTE] > 你可以为资源使用任意类型的流;例如，您可以从文件中读取非托管二进制数据。You can use any kind of stream for your resource; for example, you can read the unmanaged binary data from a file. 该示例使用方法在动态模块中定义一个类型 `Main` ，并为方法体生成 MSIL。The example defines a type in the dynamic module with a `Main` method, and generates MSIL for the method body. 在生成了方法的主体 `Main` 并创建了类型后，代码示例将向与清单资源关联的流写入五个字节。After the body for the `Main` method has been generated and the type has been created, the code example writes five bytes to the stream associated with the manifest resource. 保存程序集时，会将资源追加到该程序集。When the assembly is saved, the resource is appended to it. 运行该示例后，可以运行发出的程序集。After running the example, you can run the emitted assembly. 发出的程序集的方法中的代码 `Main` 读取嵌入的清单资源，并将字节值输出到控制台。The code in the emitted assembly's `Main` method reads the embedded manifest resource and prints the byte values to the console. 您可以使用 [Ildasm.exe (IL 拆装器) ](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler) 查看程序集清单中的信息。You can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](/dotnet/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler) to view the information in the assembly manifest. [!code-csharp[DefineManifestResource#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/DefineManifestResource/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DefineManifestResource#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/DefineManifestResource/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 DLL 导入属性 (参阅无法将 System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute) 的说明指定为此方法的参数。Some DLL import attributes (see the description of System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute) cannot be specified as arguments to this method. 此类特性应通过发出方法的自定义特性进行设置。Such attributes should be set by emitting a custom attribute for the method. 例如，DLL 导入属性 `PreserveSig` 通过发出自定义属性设置。For example, the DLL import attribute `PreserveSig` is set by emitting a custom attribute. > [!NOTE] > 从开始 [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)] ，此成员不再需要 带有 标志的。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (参阅 [反射发出中的安全问题](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit)。 ) 若要使用此功能，你的应用程序应面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `DefinePInvokeMethod` 如何使用方法 `MessageBoxA` 在 Windows API 中为外部非托管方法创建。The following example illustrates the use of the `DefinePInvokeMethod` method to create a for an external unmanaged method, `MessageBoxA`, in the Windows API. 该示例将显示一个包含 " **重试** " 和 " **取消** " 按钮的消息框，并显示消息框中的返回值。The example displays a message box with **Retry** and **Cancel** buttons, and displays the return value from the message box. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要获取非零返回值，你必须在 创建后 通过使用和方法添加到方法实现标志 。To get a non-zero return value, you must add to the method implementation flags after you create the , by using the and methods. remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReflectionTypeLoadException` 是一个特殊的类加载异常。`ReflectionTypeLoadException` is a special class load exception. `ReflectionTypeLoadException.Types`属性包含在模块中定义并加载的类的数组。The `ReflectionTypeLoadException.Types` property contains the array of classes that were defined in the module and loaded. 此数组可以包含某些 null 值。This array can contain some null values. `ReflectionTypeLoadException.LoaderExceptions`属性是一个异常数组，表示由类加载程序引发的异常。The `ReflectionTypeLoadException.LoaderExceptions` property is an array of exceptions that represent the exceptions that were thrown by the class loader. 类数组中的孔与异常一起排列。The holes in the class array line up with the exceptions. 例如，如果某个类的类初始值设定项在加载时引发了异常， `TargetInvocationException` 则会将其存储在数组的相应元素中 `LoaderExceptions` 。For example, if the class initializers of one of the classes throws an exception while it is being loaded, a `TargetInvocationException` is stored in the corresponding element of the `LoaderExceptions` array. > [!NOTE] > 从开始 [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)] ，此成员不再需要 带有 标志的。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this member no longer requires with the flag. (参阅 [反射发出中的安全问题](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit)。 ) 若要使用此功能，你的应用程序应面向 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。(See [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](/dotnet/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit).) To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标记用于 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令来识别对象。Tokens are used in Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instructions to identify objects. 标记相对于其中包含它们的模块。Tokens are relative to the module in which they are contained. 例如，的标记值 `String` 可能不同于模块到模块。For example, the token value for `String` is likely to be different from module to module. `GetTypeToken`调用时，会将引用添加到模块。When `GetTypeToken` is invoked, a reference is added to the module. 引用将成为模块的永久部分;具有相同参数的多个调用没有其他效果。The reference becomes a permanent part of the module; multiple calls with the same argument have no additional effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于从非托管代码访问托管类，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 有关的详细信息 `IDispatch::Invoke` ，请参阅 MSDN library。For more information about `IDispatch::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library. 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
